page.title: 09RELIGION
page.content: {Religion }plays an important part in the community through the {Gillespie {Centre }and the various churches. At one time {Biggar }had three Protestant churches,now as a result of various amalgamations there is only one.The main church of the Community is the old Medieval church of {St Mary's}. Although the other two churches are redundant,one the Moat Park is used as a resource centre for the Biggar Museum Trust and the other is used as a Community Centre run by the church.The {Gillespie Centre } has proved very successful and must serve as an inspiration to other communities with redundant churches.The Catholic Community have a small chapel,which serves the Biggar area;this is called{ {St Isidore's}. {
